Lucky: Can gain advantage on an attack, ability, or saving throw or inflict foe disadvantage an attack on self 3 times per long rest

Speak With Small Beasts: Can communicate simple ideas with small animals

Improved Divine Smite: Melee attacks inflict +1d8 HP radiant

Small: Has disadvantage on attacks with heavy weapons

Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 2; B1: 1; P1: 4; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 2 Attack: B: 10; Forest Gnome: 11; P: 10 Spell DC: B: 18; Forest Gnome: 19; P: 18
Spells:
Augury (P2 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Divi): Reveals the weal or woe outcome of a proposed act up to 30 min in the future [R]
Banishing Smite (P5 Abju): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +5d10 HP force, plus banishment to home plane or a demiplane for concentration up to 1 min if the attack reduces the target below 51 hit points
Blinding Smite (P3 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +3d8 HP radiant and blinds (save Constitution ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Call Lightning (P3 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Conj): R120' 5' radius inflicts 3d10 HP lightning (save Dexterity half; +1d10 HP if using a natural storm) once per rd for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Commune With Nature (P5 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Divi): Reveals 3 facts about nature within 3 miles, or within 300' when underground [R]
Compelled Duel (P1 Ench): R30' Target stays within 30' of self (save Wisdom negates) and suffers disadvantage on attacks on others for concentration up to 1 min; self attacking another or a successful attack on the target by an ally ends
Control Water (P4 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Tran): R300' Water in a 100' cube rises 20', parts, redirects, or forms a whirlpool for concentration up to 10 min
Create Or Destroy Water (P1 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Tran): R30' Creates or destroys 10 gallons of water or fog in a 30' cube [+Level affects +10 gallons or a +5' cube]
Crusader's Mantle (P3 Evoc): Ally attacks in 30' radius inflict +1d4 HP radiant for concentration up to 1 min
Dancing Lights (B0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Death Ward (P4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP or survives the next death effect within 8 hrs
Detect Evil And Good (P1 Divi): R30' Reveals aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends, undead, consecration, and desecration for concentration up to 10 min
Divine Favor (P1 Evoc): Self weapons inflict +1d4 HP radiant for concentration up to 1 min
Expeditious Retreat (P1 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Tran): Self gains a bonus Dash once per rd for concentration up to 10 min
Find Steed (P2 Conj): R10' Self gains the service of a summoned spirit in steed form
Freedom Of Movement (P4 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Freedom Of The Waves (P3 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Conj): R120' 15' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and knocks prone (Strength neg); self may teleport w/in affected area
Freedom Of The Winds (P5 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Abju): Self gains 60' flying speed and Adv vs. grapple, restraint, and paralysis for conc up to 10 min; self may teleport 60', ending spell
Lesser Restoration (P2 Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Locate Creature (P4 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified creature or species within 1000' for concentration up to 1 hr; running water blocks
Locate Object (P2 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified object or type within 1000' for concentration up to 10 min; lead blocks
Longstrider (B1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Magic Circle (P3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents a choice of physical entry or exit (save Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts disadvantage on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead, for 1 hr [+Level extends the duration +1 hr]
Minor Illusion (B0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Minor Illusion (Forest Gnome0 [Natural Illusionist] Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Misty Step (P2 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Raise Dead (P5 Necr): Restores life with 1 hit point to and removes nonmagical diseases and poisons from a willing touched 10-day-old corpse; target suffers -4 attacks, saves, and ability checks, reduced by 1 for each long rest
Staggering Smite (P4 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack within concentration up to 1 min inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, disadvantage on attacks and ability checks for 1 rd, and loss of reactions for 1 rd (save Wisdom HP only)
Thunderous Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP thunder and a 10' push (save Strength HP only) for concentration up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Bard): Knows 2 bard cantrips and can cast a chosen B1 spell once per long rest
Aura Of Liberation: R30' Targets cannot be grappled or restrained, ignore underwater movement and attack penalties
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect once per short rest
Cleansing Touch: Can dispel a spell effect on a touched willing creature 4 times per long rest
Lay On Hands: Can heal 100 hit points per long rest and can use 5 hit points' worth to cure disease or poison
Marine Layer: May use Channel Divinity to create a 20' radius that obscures vision for 10 min
Natural Illusionist: Knows the Minor Illusion cantrip
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the paladin spell list
Notes
Validation Errors:
Tool Proficiency Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
Two-Handed Weapon With Shield: Shields cannot be used with two-handed weapons
